Vector Fields

12 months ago

Field Description Required Example
Protease Name of protease to cleave purified product with (free text) Optional TEV protease
Protease cut sequence Protease cut sequence, with a star for cut position Required, if you want SATurn to calculate cut construct sequences automatically ENLYFQ*
Protease product Direction of the cut product you are interested in relative to the protease cleavage site Required, if you want SATurn to calculate cut construct sequences automatically DOWNSTREAM | UPSTREAM
Restriction site 1 Restriction site to cut vector with (for Lic cloning follow this guide). Restriction sites must already have been entered into the database (see the instructions here) Required to generate ligated products / constructs Lic5
Restriction site 2 Restriction site to cut vector with (for Lic cloning follow this guide). Restriction sites must already have been entered into the database (see the instructions here) Required to generate ligated products / constructs Lic3
Forward extension Extension to add to forward primer to be compatible with vector / restriction site Required for the construct designer to generate compatible primers automatically TACTTCCAATCCATG
Reverse extension Extension to add to reverse primer to be compatible with vector / restriction site Required for the construct designer to generate compatible primers automatically TATCCACCTTTACTGTCA
